text: Mark Anthony Martin (born January 9, 1959) is a retired NASCAR driver. Martin is often called the best driver to never have won a Sprint cup championship. Martin won five International Race of Champions (IROC) series championships. Mark Martin has driven for Roush Fenway Racing, Earnhardt Ganassi Racing, Hendrick Motorsports and Michael Waltrip Racing in the NASCAR Sprint Cup series. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:NASCAR drivers Category:American racecar drivers
title: Mark Martin
